import re

def convert_date_format(input_string):
    pattern = ''
    substitution = '\\2/\\1/\\3'
    output_string = re.sub(pattern, substitution, input_string)
    return output_string

import re

def convert_date_format(input_string):
    pattern = '(\\d{2})/(\\d{2})/(\\d{4})'
    substitution = ''
    output_string = re.sub(pattern, substitution, input_string)
    return output_string
